title: French Language Essentials - Easy Mode
description: Choose the English equivalent of the given French language.

items.question: Un billet pour Paris, s'il vous plaît
Je voudrais louer une voiture
choices: I would like to rent a car
I would like to buy a car
I want to sell a car
items.answer: I would like to rent a car

items.question: Avez-vous des chambres libres ?
choices: Do you have a free meal?
Do you have a free guide?

items.question: Je voudrais commander maintenant
choices: I would like to order now
I would like to pay now
I would like to leave now
I would like to wait now
items.answer: I would like to order now

items.question: C'est combien pour l'entrée ?
choices: How much is the entrance fee?
How much is the main course?
How much for a guided tour?
items.answer: How much is the entrance fee?

items.question: Pouvez-vous m'appeler un taxi ?
choices: Can you call me a taxi?
Can you book me a hotel?
Can you find me a guide?
Can you lend me a phone?
items.answer: Can you call me a taxi?
